scripts.test:openapi: cd src && mintlify openapi-check platform.json && mintlify openapi-check read.json && mintlify openapi-check write.json
scripts.test:links: cd src && mintlify broken-links; exitCode=$?; exit $exitCode
scripts.gen-api-pages:dir: cd src && rm -rf reference && mkdir -p reference
scripts.gen-api-pages:platform: cd src && mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o reference platform.json | tail -n +2 > reference/platform.json
scripts.gen-api-pages:read: cd src && mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o reference read.json | tail -n +2 > reference/read.json
scripts.gen-api-pages:write: cd src && mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o reference write.json | tail -n +2 > reference/write.json
